data.note: Out (Knee) - The Pistons announced on Thursday (Oct. 16) that Ivey underwent an arthroscopic procedure to relieve right knee discomfort and will be re-evaluated in four weeks.
Day To Day (Knee) - The Pistons listed LeVert as Probable for Friday's (Oct. 24) game against the Rockets.
Day To Day (Hip) - The Pistons listed Sasser as Doubtful for Friday's (Oct. 24) game against the Rockets.
